name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Super Mario Leaders Pack
summary: A mod that adds 3 unique Mario themed civilizations (Mushroom Kingdom, Koopas and Sarasaland) with 3 unique leaders (Peach, Bowser and Daisy). Leaders are fully 3D animated with their own custom background music, and unique visuals from both units and governors. If Hero Mode is enabled, 2 new heroes are also available: Mario & Luigi.
